snippet.title: Tormented Souls 2 Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show at Gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

Caroline Walker returns in Tormented Souls 2, a sinister survival horror game that wrapped up the Future Games Show at Gamescom 2023. It’s coming to PC and consoles in 2024.

Want more exclusive info on Tormented Souls 2? Check out our in-depth developer interview https://youtu.be/b3uNibovG0Y?si=R9JWkCO16xzGVxpA

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
